verses.verse: Now Pashhur <S%H6583><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, who was chief <S%H6496><s%> officer <S%H5057><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, heard <S%H8085><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> prophesying <S%H5012><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>.

Then Pashhur <S%H6583><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> him in the stocks <S%H4115><s%> that were in the upper <S%H5945><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, which was in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, that Pashhur <S%H6583><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> out of the stocks <S%H4115><s%>. Then said <S%H559><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah hath not called <S%H7121><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> Pashhur <S%H6583><s%>, but Magor-missabib <S%H4036><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Behold <S%H5414><s%>, I will make thee a terror <S%H4032><s%> to thyself <S%H157><s%>, and to all thy friends; and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, and thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5414><s%>; and I will give all Judah <S%H3063><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and he shall carry them captive <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and shall slay <S%H5221><s%> them with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Moreover I will give <S%H5414><s%> all the riches <S%H2633><s%> of this city <S%H5892><s%>, and all the gains <S%H3018><s%> thereof <S%H3366><s%>, and all the precious things thereof <S%H214><s%>, yea, all the treasures of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>; and they shall make them a prey <S%H962><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> them <S%H935><s%>, and carry them to Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

And thou <S%H6583><s%>, Pashhur, and all that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in thy house <S%H1004><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>; and thou shalt come <S%H935><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and there thou shalt die <S%H4191><s%>, and there shalt thou be buried <S%H6912><s%>, thou <S%H157><s%>, and all thy friends, to whom thou hast prophesied <S%H5012><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou hast persuaded <S%H6601><s%> me <S%H6601><s%>, and I was persuaded; thou art stronger <S%H2388><s%> than I <S%H3201><s%>, and hast prevailed: I am become a laughing-stock <S%H7814><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>, every one mocketh me <S%H3932><s%>.

For as often <S%H1767><s%> as I speak <S%H1696><s%>, I cry <S%H7121><s%> out <S%H2199><s%>; I cry <S%H7121><s%>, Violence <S%H2555><s%> and destruction <S%H1697><s%>! because the word of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is made a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto me <S%H7047><s%>, and a derision, all the day <S%H3117><s%>.

And if I say <S%H559><s%>, I will not make mention <S%H2142><s%> of him <S%H1696><s%>, nor speak any more in his name <S%H8034><s%>, then there is in my heart <S%H3820><s%> as it were a burning <S%H1197><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> shut up <S%H6113><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%>, and I am weary <S%H3811><s%> with forbearing <S%H3557><s%>, and I cannot contain <S%H3201><s%>.

For I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the defaming <S%H1681><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%>, terror <S%H4032><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>. Denounce <S%H5046><s%>, and we will denounce <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H582><s%>, say all my familiar friends <S%H8104><s%>, they that watch for my fall <S%H6763><s%>; peradventure he will be persuaded <S%H6601><s%>, and we shall prevail <S%H3201><s%> against him <S%H3947><s%>, and we shall take our revenge on him <S%H5360><s%>.

But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is with me as a mighty <S%H1368><s%> one <S%H6184><s%> and a terrible <S%H7291><s%>: therefore my persecutors shall stumble <S%H3782><s%>, and they shall not prevail <S%H3201><s%>; they shall be utterly <S%H3966><s%> put to shame <S%H954><s%>, because they have not dealt wisely <S%H7919><s%>, even with an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> dishonor <S%H3639><s%> which shall never be forgotten <S%H7911><s%>.

But <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that triest <S%H974><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, that seest <S%H7200><s%> the heart <S%H3629><s%> and the mind <S%H3820><s%>, let me see <S%H7200><s%> thy vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on them <S%H1540><s%>; for unto thee have I revealed my cause <S%H7379><s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for he hath delivered <S%H5337><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the needy <S%H34><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of evil-doers <S%H7489><s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the day <S%H3117><s%> wherein I was born <S%H3205><s%>: let not the day <S%H3117><s%> wherein my mother <S%H517><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> me be blessed <S%H1288><s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> who brought tidings <S%H1319><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, A <S%H2145><s%> man-child <S%H1121><s%> is born <S%H3205><s%> unto thee <S%H8055><s%>; making him very glad <S%H8055><s%>.

And let that man <S%H376><s%> be as the cities <S%H5892><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H2015><s%>, and repented <S%H5162><s%> not <S%H8085><s%>: and let him hear a cry <S%H2201><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and shouting <S%H8643><s%> at noontime <S%H6256><s%>;

because he slew <S%H4191><s%> me not from the womb <S%H7358><s%>; and so my mother <S%H517><s%> would have been my grave <S%H6913><s%>, and her womb <S%H7358><s%> always <S%H5769><s%> great <S%H2030><s%>.

Wherefore came I forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the womb <S%H7358><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> labor <S%H5999><s%> and sorrow <S%H3015><s%>, that my days <S%H3117><s%> should be consumed <S%H3615><s%> with shame <S%H1322><s%>?
